definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: burn, consume (Targum [[בְּעַר]] burn; b9ar seek out, collect, glean; this apparently earlier mng.)—

(intr.) specif. begin to burn, be kindled Ps 18:8 sq. [[מִן]] (subj. [[גֶּחָלִים]]) = 2Sa 22:9 (in v:2Sa 22:13 text. error cf. supr.), Ps 106:18 (subj. [[אֵשׁ]]); fig. Ps 2:12 (subj. [[אַפּוֹ]]) cf. Je 44:6 (subj. [[חֵמָה]]); Is 30:33 (c. [[בְּ]], subj. ´[[נִשְׁמַת י]]), Ps 39:4 (subj. [[אֵשׁ]] fig. of grief, distress) cf. Je 20:9.

be burning, burn, Ju Jdg 15:14 (subj. [[פִּשְׁתִּים]], c. [[בָּאֵשׁ]]), Ex 3:2 ([[הסנה]], c. [[בָּאֵשׁ]]), v:Ex 3:3 (subj. id.); De 4:11, De 5:20, De 9:15 (all subj. [[הר]], c. [[בָּאֵשׁ]]), cf. Is 34:9 ([[זֶפֶת בערה]]), fig. of destruction Is 1:31 (subj. [[חָסׂן]] & [[פּׂעֲלוֹ]]); of torch [[לַפִּיד]] Is 62:1; of oven [[תַּנּוּר]] Ho 7:4, Ho 7:6 (i.e. heated by fire within it).

trans. burn, consume (subj. [[אשׁ]], [[להבה]] etc., sq. [[בְּ]]) Nu 11:1, Nu 11:3 (´[[אשׁ י]]), Job 1:16 ([[אשׁ אלהים]]); in smile Ez 1:33 (´[[גחלי אשׁ י]]), Ps 83:15 (only here trans. c. acc.; should [[תבער]] be pointed as Pi. ?); fig. (subj. wrath of ´[[י]]) Is 42:25 cf. La 2:5 (subj. fire = fiery trial) Is 43:2.

act. but abs., fig., subj. wrath of ´[[י]] Je 4:4, Je 7:20, Je 21:12, Ps 89:47 cf. Is 10:17, Ps 79:5, Is 30:27 ([[בּׂעֵר אַפּוֹ]]… ´[[שֵׁם י]]) Mal 3:19 ([[היום בא]]); of human anger Es 1:12; subj. wickedness Is 9:17.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[בִּעֵר]] 1Ki 22:47, 2Ki 23:24, [[וּבִעֵר]] consec. Le 6:5, [[בִּעַ֫רְתָּ]] 2Ch 19:3, [[וּבִ ַערְתָּ֫]] De 13:6 + 9 t. in Dt; [[וּבִעֲרוּ]] cons. Ez Eze 39:9, Eze 39:9 (9:a del. Co after Vrss), etc.; Impf. [[יְבַעֵר]] 1Ki 14:10; 2 ms. [[תְּבַעֵר]] De 21:9, [[יְבַעֲרוּ]] Ez Eze 39:10; 2 mpl. [[תְּבַעֲרוּ]] Ex 35:3, [[וּנְבַעֲרָ֫ה]] subord. Ju Jdg 20:13; Pt. [[מְבַעֲרִים]] Je 7:18; —

kindle, lit. c. acc. [[אשׁ]] Ex 35:3, Je 7:18 cf. Ez Eze 39:9 (v. supr.) v:Eze 39:10; fig. of ´[[י]] sending destruction Ez Eze 21:4 cf. of human schemes Is 50:11; light, obj. lamps in temple 2Ch 4:20 cf. 2Ch 13:11.
burn, lit. c. acc. [[עֵחִים]] Le 6:5, [[גׇּלָל]] dung 1Ki 14:10; abs. Is 44:15 cf. Is 40:16, Ne 10:35.

fig. consume, utterly remove, partic. of evil and guilt, c. acc., esp. in Deuteronomic phrase ([[מישׂראל]])[[ובערת הרע מקרבך ]] De 13:6, De 17:7, De 17:12, De 19:13, De 19:19, De 21:21 cf. v:De 21:9, De 22:21, De 22:22, De 22:24, De 24:7, v. also Ju Jdg 20:13; further, 1Ki 22:47, 2Ki 23:24, 2Ch 19:3; also of devoted (tabooed) things De 26:13, De 26:14; of persons (exterminate) 2Sa 4:11; sq. [[אחרי]] pregn. 1Ki 14:10, 1Ki 21:21; = devour, devastate, greedily enjoy the fruits of, Is 3:14; abs. [[היה לְבָעֵר]] be for destruction, be destroyed Nu 24:22, Is 5:5, Is 6:13; cf. [[רוּחַ בָּעֵר]] Is 4:4.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מְבׂעָָרֶת]] Je 36:22; —burn (i.e. be supplied with fire), of fire-jar, [[הָאָח]].
kindle (c. acc. cogn.) Ex 22:5, cf. Ju Jdg 15:5 [[אשׁ בלפידים]] ´[[ויב]] caused fire to burn among the brands.
burn up, c. acc. Ju Jdg 15:5, 2Ch 28:3 (sacrifice of children [[בָּאֵשׁ]]) Ez Eze 5:2 ([[בָּאוּר]] but cf. Co) Na 2:14 ([[בעשׁן]]).
